mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gallery(imgid, imgname, imgfile, imgup ,imgwriter) values (#{imgid},#{imgname},#{imgfile},0,#{imgwriter})
mapper.update: UPDATE gallery set imgup = imgup +1 where imgid= #{#imgid}
mapper.select: SELECT imgid, imgname, imgfile, imgdate, imgup, imgwriter from gallery order by imgup desc limit 4;

choose.when: WHERE imgwriter like '%${keyword}%' OR imgname like '%${keyword}%'
